Html:
Hi

Due to ALVAR library is only provided free for trial version (during a year), i would like know if there is another way to run Alvar without the limitation.


Another topic is i'm trying to make a wrapper to unite with ARToolKit IMarkerTracker interface of goblinxna.  I found this: http://sites.google.com/site/augmentedrealitytestingsite/ and http://www.mperfect.net/wpfAugReal/. I supose that i need to create a ArtoolkiTracker and ArtoolkitDllBridge, like with Alvar/ArTag, and adapt functionalities of the first one for IMarkerTracker. Has anyone managed to make a wrapper for Artoolkit?

Thank you very much for the help!

That's correct. We have internal version of ARToolkit wrapper for Goblin XNA, but we can't release it due to GPL license.

Ohan
